documents.document:
ANGRY,SO ANGRY

I HAVE 5 FRIENDS WAITING TO BE ACCEPTED TO BE MY FRIENDS,BUT I FIND NO WAY TO ACCEPT THEM...I TRIED I SWEAR NOT ONCE BUT SO MANY TIMES THE WAY TO ACCEPT THEM BUT I CAN'T FIND OUT.OH,I HATE MYSELF THIS TIME.AM I SO STUPID?IS THERE ANYONE CAN HELP ME????PLEASSSSSSSSSSSSE!!!!!!

THE END OF DAY

ANOTHER DAY GOES BY.NOW THE CLOCK SHOWS EXACTLY 24:00.THE BELL RINGS TO MARK MIDNIGHT.I SPEND ANOTHER DAY STUDYING,GOING TO SCHOOL,THEN GOING HOME WITH AN EXHAUSTION.SOMETIMES I FEEL FED UP WITH THIS BORING ROUTINE,BUT WHAT I CAN DO TO EXCHANGE THAT?I ALWAYS FEEL DISSAPOINTED WITH SO MANY THINGS.I SHOULD LEARN WAYS TO ACCEPT INSTEAD OF DENYING_MY HEAD SAYS SO_BUT MY HEART NEVER AGREES WITH....
ONE DAY AND THEN ONE DAY GOES BY,TIME FLIES BUT I CAN'T FLY

ANGER

I GOT STUCK IN A TRAFFIC JAM.THAT'S TERRIBLE!ALL I CAN SEE IN FRONT OF ME IS JUST THE CROWD WITH MOTORBIKES AND CARS.MY EYES HURT.OH,HOW AWFUL IT IS!!!THE AIR IS FULL OF SMOKE AND EXHAUST FUME.EVEN I CAN'T BREATHE.I IMAGINE AS IF I COULD PASS DOWN IMMEDIATELY. WHEN I GET HOME,OH CAN YOU IMAGINE HOW HAPPY I WAS???SO FUNNY,RIGHT??BUT IN DEVELOPING COUNTRIES,THIS IS A NORMAL THINGS DURING RUSH HOURS.I JUST WANT TO SIT IN A CAR AND DRIVE ANYWHERE WITHOUT FEELING THE POLLUTED AIR OUTSIDE.UNFORTUNATELY THAT'S STILL MY DREAM!!!!

LOOKING FOR THE WARMTH

IT WAS A FROZEN DAY IN DENVER.IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO PREDICT WEATHER IN THIS PLACE.YESTERDAY,THE SKY WAS FILLED WITH SUNSHINE,THE NEXT DAY THE STREETS WERE FULL OF SNOW.
I SHOULD HAVE STAYED AT HOME ON A DAY LIKE THAT.HOWEVER,THAT WAS NOT MY DAY.THAT DAY I HAD A TALK WITH ABOUT 200 STUDENTS AT THE DENVER CONFERENCE CENTRE.AND WHEN I LOOKED FOR THE WIRELESS MICROPHONE,I FOUND THAT IT WAS OUT OF BATTERY.HAVING NO CHOICE,I WORE A HIGH_COLLAR COAT ,A SCARF AROUND MY NECK,AND WENT OUT OF HOME.AT THE CORNER OF THE SECOND LINE OF STREETS,I FOUND THERE WAS A SMALL DEPARTMENT STORE NEARBY.
IN THE STORE ,THERE WERE ONLY TWO PEOPLE.THE SALESGIRL WAS A COLOURED GIRL,STANDING AFTER THE CHECK-OUT,WITH A CARD ON THE SHIRT,NAMED ROBERTA.IF JUST LOOK OUTSIDE,YOU COULD QUICKLY JUDGE THAT SHE WAS A SIMPLE GIRL.THE SECOND ONE WAS AN OLD MAN,MAYBE HE WANTED TO SHELTER FROM THE COLD.HE WANDERED ABOUT GOODS’ STAND,LOOK LIKE NO HURRY.
BUT I HAD NOT MUCH TIME TO CARE FOR A FREE OLD MAN.I NEEDED SOME BATTERIES,AND THERE WERE APPROXIMATELY 200 STUDENTS WAITING FOR ME AT THE CONFERENCE CENTRE.WE HAD MANY THINGS TO DO,AND WE HAD PURPOSES.
AT THE SAME TIME WHEN I INTENDED TO APPROACH THE CHECK_OUT,THE OLD MAN STOOD THERE ALREADY.ROBERTA SMILED.THE OLD MAN SAID NOTHING.ROBERTA TOOK EACH THINGS WHICH HE CHOSE IN ORDER TO CHARGE THE CODE INTO MACHINE.I WAS CURIOUS,SO,I LOOKED TO FOLLOW. IT TURNED OUT TO BE THAT THE OLD MAN WALKED ALL A LONG WAY IN A COLD DAY LIKE THAT TO THIS STORE JUST TO BUY A CAKE AND A BANANA!!!WHAT AN ODD!!!
ROBERTA ALREADY FIRGURED OUT THE AMOUNT OF MONEY,WHEREAS THE OLD MAN SLOWLY PUT HIS HANDS INTO THE OLD COAT’S POCKET. “HURRY UP!!!”_I THOUGHT IN MY HEAD_ “YOU MAY BE FREE ALL DAY,BUT I HAVE MANY THINGS TO DO!!!”
THE OLD MAN PULLED A CRUMPLED PAPER OF MONEY AND SOME COINS OUT OF HIS POCKET AND PUT ON THE TABLE.ROBERTA SMILED BRIGHTLY AND COLLECTED THAT MONEY AS IF SHE HAD JUST RECEIVED A TREASURE.
WHEN ROBERTA PUT THE CAKE AND BANANA INTO A NYLON BAG,ONE MEMORABLE THING HAPPENED.THE OLD MAN STILL SAID NOTHING,JUST STRECTCHED OUT HIS HAND.THE HANDS WERE SO SKINNY AND SHAKING.ROBERTA GENTLY PUT THE BAG ON HIS ARM_WRIST.AND SHE SMILED MORE BRIGHTLY.

CONTINUE THE STORY

THAT WASN’T THE END,ROBERTA SUDDENLY TOOK HIS OLD MAN’S HANDS ,SHE QUICKLY TOO K THE SCARF SHE PUT ON THE FIREPLACE AND WOUND IT ROUND HIS HANDS TO WARM HIM UP.THE N SHE PUT THE SCARF ON HIS NECK ,FASTENED A BUTTON OF HIS COAT.HE STILL SAID NO WORD,HOWEVER,I BELIEVED THAT IN HIS OLD EYES SHINING WARM LIGHT RAYS.PERHAPS HE WAS TRYING TO KEEP IN MIND THAT MOMENT,AT LEAST TILL THE FOLLOWING DAY WHEN HE CAME BACK THE STORE.
AFTER PUTTING THE SCARF ON HIS NECK,ROBERTA LOOKED AT HIM AND BLAMED:
“WELL,HOW MANY TIMES DID I TELL YOU TO WEAR WARMLY ENOUGH IF GOING OUTSIDE?I REMINDED YOU TO BE CAREFUL,RIGHT?_ SHE PAUSED A WHILE TO EMPASIZE_I WANT YOU STLL BE FINE WHEN COME BACK TOMORROW”.
THE OLD MAN TOOK THE BAG AND SLOWLY WENT TO THE DOOR.
AT THAT MOMENT I REALISED THAT THE OLD MAN CAME THERE NOT TO BUY JUST A CAKE AND A BANANA.HE CAME TO LOOK FOR THE WARMTH.IN THE HEART.
I ASKED ROBERTA:
“IS HE YOUR RELATIVE OR YOUR NEIGHBOUR?”
SHE LOOKED LIKE A BIT OFFENDED WHEN I SUPPOSED THAT SHE ONLY TREATED LIKE THAT WITH RELATIVES OR NEIGHBOURS.TO ROBERTA,OBVIOUSLY,EVERYONE WAS SPECIAL.

SAD

MY EYES ARE RED.I'VE JUST SAID GOODBYE TO MY FRIENDS.NOW THEY ARE ON THE TRIP COMING BACK JAPAN.THEY VISITED SAIGON BY SHIP FOR THREE DAYS.I HOPE THEY CAN STAY LONGER,BUT THEY NEED TO COME BACK HOME.THEY ARE FAR AWAY HOME MORE THAN A MONTH.THEY MISS THEIR HOMES,BUT I MISS THEM TOO.I DON'T WANT TO SAY GOODBYE,SO I JUST SAY "REMEMBER ME!".I KNOW THEY SOON FORGET 'CAUSE THEIR LIVES ARE SO BUSY.BUT IN MY HEART I WON'T NEVER FORGET THEM,NO MATTER WHAT HAPPENS,I'M SURE THAT.SU,PANANA,HONEY,KUNG ARE THEIR NAMES.NOW I SIT HERE,TYPE THESE LINES,WONDER IF THEY THINK OF ME OR NOT.MAYBE WE DON'T HAVE CHANCES TO MEET AGAIN,I WILL KEEP THEM IN MY HEART FOREVER.I LOVE THEIR GIFTS TOO.THEY'RE SO CUTE.

"WARM" WINTER

TIME FLIES.DAY COMES .DAY GOES.BUT I'M STILL HERE,NOT MOVE FORWARD OR UPWARD. A DAY BEGINS WHEN THE SUN RISES,I OPEN MY EYES AND KNOW THAT IT'S TIME TO GET UP FOR A NEW DAY.BUT ALL I DO IS THE OLD THINGS,DAY BY DAY EVERYTHING CHANGES,EXCEPT ME.I WANT TO DO SOME THING DIFFERENT WITH MY ROUTINE,BUT WHAT I CAN DO?I HAVE NO IDEA.I GO TO SCHOOL,MEET FRIENDS IN CLASS,TALK TO THEM ALL SILLY THINGS AROUND FASHION,SCHOOL WORK,BOYS,ETC...TAKE PART IN SOME CLUBS OR ACTIVITIES IN SCHOOL,THEN GO HOME,DO THE HOUSEWORK,FINISH MY TASKS AT SCHOOL,THEN GO TO NET...ALL I WANT IS TO TRAVEL AROUND THE WORLD,I HATE THIS BORING LIFE.IS THERE ANYONE OUT THERE CAN HELP ME?GUESS NOT.CAUSE YOU'RE SO FAR AWAY FROM ME,MAYBE YOU KNOW MW,MAYBE NOT.ALL I CAN DO IS SOMEONE REALLY CARES TO MY EMOTIONS,NOT MY APPEARANCE.THAT'S WHY I WROTE THESE LINES.HOPE THAT SOMEONE READS THIS.CHRISTMAS IS COMING,BUT HERE THE WEATHER IS STILL WARM,CAUSE I LIVE IN A TROPICAL COUNTRY.I WILL NEVER ABLE TO SEE SNOW,TO WALK AND PLAY IN SNOW.THAT'S MY WISH FOR X_MAS!!!SO BORED!!

LOSS

Many people around you,but you even don't know their names,don't remember their faces.Then one day they walk into your life,they become your friend,become your lover,become your adviser or a benefactor.You just don't realize how important they are to your life until you lose contact with them one day.You start to feel nervous,you start to feel missing,you start to feel scared.
You start to think what would happen if you can't see them once again.Will they miss u?Will they remember you?Are they busy and have no time for you?Or they just ignore you?You feel as if you are lost a part of your life,without knowing how to save.
You want to shout : "WHERE ARE YOU?I'M LOST.FIND ME.HOLD ME TIGHT.DON'T LEAVE ME."

THE TASTE OF MY FEELING

THE WAY WE LOOK AT THINGS IS NOT THE SAME.SO THE WAY WE FEEL IN FRONT OF THINGS IS ALWAYS DIFFERENT.WORDS CAN'T DESCRIBE EVERYTHING,AND THERE ARE SOME LIMITATIONS THAT WORDS HARDLY EXPRESS.WHY I CAN'T FEEL THE HAPPINESS?EVEN I SMILE,I LAUGH, I SPEAK LOUD,JUST THE SURFACE.WHEN ALONE,I TASTE THE FEELING OF MY HEARRT,SO SAD,SO PAINFUL,A DARK HOLE AND I'M TRYING TO HIDE IT FROM OTHERS.I WONDER IF I CAN KEEPP IT FOR LONG,I FEEL PAIN AND I CAN'T FIND A SHOULDER TO CRY ON.IN VN NOW IS THE LUNAR NEW YEAR,EVERYBODY IS VERY HAPPY TO CELEBRATE THE TET HOLIDAY(THE BIGGEST HOLIDAY IN VIETNAM),THE STREETS ARE FULL OF FLOWERS,AND THE COUPLES HANDS IN HANDS,BUT MY HEART ARE EMPTY,I WALK IN THE STREETS,LOOK AT THE COLOURFUL LIGHTS, PEOPLE IN NEW BEAUTIFUL CLOTHES WITH HAPPY FACES,I FEEL EMPTY.THIS FEELING OVERWHELMS ME,AND IT'S HURTING ME.THE WORDS CAN'T SAY EVERYTHING,YOU'RE NOT ME,AND THE WAY YOU FEEL IS NEVER THE SAME AS ME.YOU SUPPORT ME,YOU SYMPATHIZE,BUT WORDS ARE NEVER ENOUGH.CAN YOU HOLD ME IN YOUR ARMS WHEN I'M DESPERATE? CAN YOU SAVE ME WHEN I HAVE NO STAND IN LIFE? CAN YOU WIPE MY TEARS AND MAKE ME SMILE AGAIN WHEN MY HEART IS BROKEN? CAN YOU KEEP MY HANDS IN YOUR HANDS FOREVER?WHO CAN ANSWER ME???

LITTLE GIRL WALKING

In the rain,a little girl is walking,walking,walking without knowing why she keeps walking.What she is looking for in the dark,in the rain?The tears runs on her face.Her eyes look blank and dark.What she is waiting for.No,there is nothing on the street for a shadow,no places for a shelter,no fire for warmth,no one cares for her.She continues walking,alone on the street,stra?ght forward.She wants to shout for help,she wants to run for hiding,but she can't control herself, her legs still walk and she keeps moving ahead without no one keeps her stay. How long has she walked like that? an hour? a month? a year? or a life? The girl keeps walking from day till night,day after day,but no one notices.Why they can't realize her loneliness? Why they can't walk with her? Why they don't wonder even a little about the girl? Times flies quickly.Sooner or later she has to stop,because she has no energy to keep walking.The girl now turns into an old woman,but she is still alone. All her life she lives in quietness,she lives without the realization of everybody around her.Day after day,she grew older and she hoped she could find the end of the road where she could find a place of her own,a place belonging to her.But after all,she could find nothing,however,she still hopes.She never gives up hope cause she knows God will look at her,poor her,and reward her for her belief.She closes her eyes and falls into sleep,never waking up.She's gone without a sound.She's gone with a smile on her lips and tears on her face.She is in her dream seeking for the end of the road,a place of her own,a man for her life in heaven.

One word

You know why people need love? They want to feel safe, they need to be protected, to be cared for, but most of all, they need to know who they are. If you are hated or disliked, you are supposed to lose a stand in your group (family, friends, workplace, neighbors...). Life is complicating. Don't remember how many times I say dissapointing, boring, lonely, and I'm fed up with that. You who read my blog may feel fed up with me also but hiding my feeling won't help it. I need so much a lot of hugs,mais embrasser,merci non. I never stops putting questions to matters happening in this life to me, to you, to my beloved ones or to somewhere far away that I just can see in my brain. I never stops wondering whether I'm doing wrong or not, always wondering where the right place I head to.

How many times you say 'I know'? You know what? Nothing. You just accept it cause that's the fact, that's life, then what's 'life'? Ok, I'm too dumb with all those words and meanings that I learn from book, I learn it hard since I was born, still answers are hidden somewhere. I smile when I hear that word 'Love'. It seems like healing every holes in my brain, compensating for every unanswered questions. But 'love' is also just a word that can be changed quickly. Gosssssssh, I'm so complicated

Only if time can turn back

It's just an imagination, a wish, but only if I stop convincing that it could happen. Will it be better if time turns back? Sound of a bell wakes me up in middle of my dream. Sitting on the chair in the blue-painted room, looking out from a narrow window full of sunlight, there the kids and happy mothers talking with each other, a green yard, and small houses, i wonder where I am now. For a long time, I did not dream. Funny, dream is not something you can make up or decide but I wish once I can live in my dream if I could have one. Only if time can turn back, I did know what I would do, but only if I could change the present, I would do anything it cost, but there's no 'only if', it makes you feel regrettful, yes, I'm kind like that person, once I did look ahead and now when I am on the verge of breaking down, I am finding back to who I am, but it was covered in the 'past' that my mind did erase somehow. Only if.... time stops now, I could vanish in the air, could I?

Wander in clouds

Flying to me is the most miracle that human can ever achieve in their existence. The feeling of being in the air, being lifted from the ground, in the middle of air and cloud, hearing the wind, see the mass of the world under your palm, how is that feeling descriable with just few words? The sun comes up and down, then comes the moon and the stars, don't you ever see yourself that close to touch those masterpiece on the airplane? I know I a bit romanticize everything, but if you think not everyone has this chance in their life to see the beauty of our land, the feeling that what is there in the sky, how clouds look like, how my city look like from above? or just thinking you are flying, of course, not with wings but in airplane, is that also a great thing? You can't keep astonished at how marvelous the scenes from above but above all is how beautiful the land under your eyes, it's also a masterpiece, especially when night comes, light shines from neon or buildings or cars,houses, all just brighten up the whole darkness below that like millions candles in night. And when being covered by an infinite white clouds, do you ever think of how heaven looks like, maybe like this...Next time, do enjoy your flight thou it's short or long, cause you're flying, and that's the wish of any free person, living as flying

When my feet touch ground, I need you


Looking back pieces of my memory in each journeys to different countries in Europe, an Asian girl, totally first time exploring the culture and lifestyle of Westerners, I feel myself surprising accustomed to it naturally. There are no words or how to describe exactly what I felt each moment I could experience myself a traveller and an explorer, how amazing and lucky I was to overcome all hardships so that now I can sit here to enjoy looking my photos I took with you.
You here may be a friend, many friends or maybe a helpful stranger, a companion or a chatter. There is no different in races, skin color, or languages as long as you're open enough to accept the new and looking on bright side of matters, as long as you treat me with your hospitality, I return it back equally, as long as you think of me as a human a person physically as you are, emotional as you are, troublesome like you are, is that so important where I am from? What concerns should be my personality. I always wish I can make a backpack trip with some travelbuddies, 'cause I don't think of travelling to post photos on FB or twitter, I think of it as sincere chances to discover myself, my hidden self, you never know enough of yourself and to enlarge the world you live. I am not a daydreammer, but I know I have some depth in my soul that I need to dig up.
Instead of seeing people you know, does it surprise you how a stranger can help you that much even you meet him just few moments, how a smile can warm up your fear that much when you even don't know who she is, how a holding can make you cry that much when you even have just few hours with that person, how a night walk be such beautiful with the people you thought you never could get along. When looking back the album, does it remind you how happy you were? is it surprising how you could smile that brightly as if you were the happiest in the world?
The world is small because we attach each other closer, because we need each other much more dearly, and because we are honest with each other more. This is not fiction, Keep those dear memories in your heart, stamp it in your brain, lock in the photos and widen the smile

Memories as the breeze

When a day ends, when the darkness shadows each corner of the street, when the quietness overwhelmed the space, and when the lights faded with the moonlight, that's my most preferrable moments. The opposite between the easy-going nature with the introversion of a AB blood-type girl born under the star of scorpion makes me feel psychological paralyzed and exhausted with mood changing. It's not like something unprecedented, it's just not simple to make others understand the same way I expect. Sometimes, A total rebel hidden in the surface of the calmness, overwhemed in the sea of emotions without being able to express honestly, afraid to being hurt but desire to being loved crazily, possesive but sympathetic. The constrasting emotions keep me wavering, weak and stupid in making important decisions when it comes to relationships. I want to keep myself safe in my shell, shut down my inner world that hardly anyone knows me well, difficult to accept failure but at the same time desire to have someone break those barriers, though it would not be easy anyway, feeling distant with anybody but at the same time being able to be open with a stranger. And I keep winding the clock time to live in memories kept in photos, in music, in my impressions, in my subconscious. Well, you say, that's totally wasting time. I agree, but if it roots in your personality, it won't change as you wish. Memories are as if the breezes to me, nostalgic, pure, unchanged, and eternal, cause it's stuck in the past and noone could remake. Pictures with friends, with colleagues, with teachers, with family, or myself in any moment is always a treasure to me cause they all passed by me once in my lifetime and the emotions never the same so remember the smile you had today and kept it safely in the closet of memories.
